author: Aila Slisco
title: Ukrainian Resistance to Russia Will Make Afghans Look Tame, Schumer Says
description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) said that the Ukrainian resistance would make the Mujahideen who fended off the Soviet Union in Afghanistan for a decade "look tame."
content: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) on Friday compared Ukrainian forces fighting the Russian invasion to Afghan Mujahideen fighters who fended off the Soviet Union during the 1980s. Schumerâ€¦ [+3335 chars]
